flawed_nl_solution:
The original flock gains 30-20=<<30-20=10>>10 ducks per year
So after 5 years they have gained 10*5=<<10*5=50>>50 ducks
So the original flock has 100+50=<<100+50=510>>510 ducks
So the combined flock has 510+150=<<510+150=660>>660 ducks
#### 660

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 150, not 510. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
